Job Description:
RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Drawing plan and 3D modeling
2. Assist senior architect to revise drawing
3. Follow up with site engineer about progress of construction
4. Prepare all drawing files properly
5. Deal with problem that might come up during construction process
6. Compile project specifications
7. Site visits to check on project status and report to design manager
8. Others tasks assigned by Design Manager
Job Requirement:
QUALIFICATIONS
1. Associate degree in Architecture (Available for fresh graduated)
2. Strong portfolio to prove artistic skills
3. Understanding MEP and construction drawing
4. Be able to use computer application (2D, 3D, 3D Max, Sketch up, Google Sketch Up, Modeling and V-Ray, Adobe Photoshop and MS Office)
5. Ability to create in three dimensions
6. Be honest, hardworking and flexible

DOCUMENTS REQUIRE
1-National identification ( Copy )
2-Photo 4*6 ( Last 3 months )
3-Birth certificate (May or may not have)
4-Family / Residence Book ( Copy )
5-Criminal Record / Certificate of Behavior ( Original )
6-Certificates of Educational ( Copy )

Job Description:
The focus of District Sales Executive (DSE) is on achieving results that are aligned with the overall organization and its strategic goals. Initiative, coupled with a sense of competitive drive, and the ability to stay focused on results despite changing conditions, are the keys to achieving the performance objectives of the District Sales Executive role at Expeditors.
The job environment is flexible, constantly changing, and provides growth opportunity, recognition and reward for the achievement of business results.

Key Deliverables
1. Manage an assigned territory and demonstrate extensive knowledge of potential customers and competitors in this area
2. Timely data entry in our Customer Relationship Management tool
3. Participate in the creation of value-added solutions for customer’s logistics needs, including supporting diagrams and cost-benefit calculations
4. Support the transition of new accounts through customer introductions, information transfer, and securing any necessary customer paperwork. When needed, support AR (accounts receivable) collection.
5. Attend training & development sessions to continue developing selling skills and updating Expeditors Product and Service knowledge
6. Take on additional assignments as required, supporting company needs
Job Requirement:
Delivered Skill-Sets and Characteristics
1. The ability to meet with customers off-site on a regular basis
2. Oral and written proficiency in the English language. 
3. Able to speak Chinese language is an advantage
4. Strong problem solving, organizational, and interpersonal skills
5. Ability to work productively both individually and in a team environment
6. Sense of urgency for goal achievement
7. Self-motivated with ability to work in a fast-paced and constantly changing environment
8. Strong rapport and relationship-building focused
9. Empowered to make quick decisions in response to changing conditions
10. Extroverted, confident, enthusiastic and persuasive
11. Influences others to action
12. Timeliness and accountability for results

Additional Information
Expeditors offers excellent benefits
* Paid Vacation, Holiday, Sick Time 
* Health Plan
* Employee Stock Purchase Plan 
* Training and Personnel Development Program

Attractive income with good career prospects and remuneration package will be offered to the right candidate.  Interested party, please send your full resume and expected salary to our Human Resources, lina.bouth@expeditors.com as soon as possible. Further information about the Company can be obtained at Expeditors’ website: http://www.expeditors.com. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.

Any employment with Expeditors is contingent upon satisfactory completion of a background check

All information provided by candidates will be used solely for recruitment purposes. Unsuccessful application will be destroyed in strict confidence upon completion of recruitment process.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Lina Bouth Administration Manager 010-234-538 / 089 713 535 lina.bouth@expeditors.com LSI Building, #03, 6th Floor, St. 1019 (Phnom Penh-Hanoi), Sangkat Phnom Penh Thmey, Khan Sensok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010-234-538 / 089 713 535

Job Description:
1-Implement sales promotion effectively
2-Build good relationship with the customers
3-Follow up payment of the customer to comply with company’s credit policy
4-Work closely with dealer in provinces.
5-Monitor  control individual sales to achieve yearly target assigned by manager
6-Provide good quality  products  services  customers through telecommunication
7-Complete credit proposal form relevant documents recommendations to ensure that the debts collected following the credit terms offered.
8-Understand  market trends by collecting  market information  suggestion  improve sales
9-Prepares reports to sale manager
10-Other duties assigned by sale manager 
11-Tele communication and selling product with customers 
12-Follow up customer to be persuade to meet decision making 
13-Explain policy and promotion event to customers
14-Solve problem with customer after delivery good in case of broken or damage
Job Requirement:
1-Graduated or is pursuing Bachelor Degree in Sales and Marketing or equivalent
2-Have 1-3 years of experience as Sales Representative
3-Have good presentation and communication skills
4-Possess good in interpersonal relationship skills
5-Demonstrate skills in computer applications including word, excel, and power point.
6-Knowledge of construction products is preferable.  

DOCUMENTS REQUIRE
1-National identification ( Copy )
2-Photo 4*6  ( Last 3 months )
3-Birth certificate (May or may not have)
4-Family / Residence Book ( Copy )
5-Criminal Record / Certificate of Behavior ( Original )
6-Certificates of Educational ( Copy )

Job Description:
As an Entry Level order management agent, you will have direct oversight of order management customers to help drive visibility and efficiency in their supply chains.

Key Deliverables
1. Review Standard Operation Procedure for 100% compliance for all assigned customers.
2. Perform accurate and timely data entry into operating system.
3. Track and trace shipments.
4. Review operational dashboard daily to manage shipments.
5. Manage shipping instruction and other relevant documents with shippers and shipping lines.
6. Complete accurate and timely billings for customers.
7. Submit payment request to accounting for service provider invoices.
8. Collect and distribute commercial documents timely as per customers’ expectations.
9. Meet compliance & regulations all the times. This includes internal policies and procedures such as Operational Process Standards and external government regulations or customer policies requirements.
10. Communicate politely and firmly with all customers, with provision of exceptional customer service.
11. Respond email to both external & internal customer timely
12. Perform other tasks as assigned by supervisor/manager.
Job Requirement:
Delivered Skill-Sets and Characteristics
1. Bachelor degree, going to graduate or 6 months to 1 year related experience.
2. Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications especially EXCEL.
3. Oral and written proficiency in the English language. 
4. Ability to work productively both individually and in a team environment
5. Sense of urgency for goal achievement
6. Self-motivated with ability to work in a fast-paced and constantly changing environment
7. Strong problem solving, organizational, and interpersonal skills
8. Timeliness and accountability for results

Additional Information
Expeditors offers excellent benefits
* Paid Vacation, Holiday, Sick Time 
* Training and Personnel Development Program
* There will be career opportunities within the company (local, regional and globally).

Attractive income with good career prospects and remuneration package will be offered to the right candidate.  Interested party, please send your full resume and expected salary to our Human Resources, lina.bouth@expeditors.com by 15 Dec 2021 or as soon as possible. Further information about the Company can be obtained at Expeditors’ website: http://www.expeditors.com. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.

Any employment with Expeditors is contingent upon satisfactory completion of a background check

All information provided by candidates will be used solely for recruitment purposes. Unsuccessful application will be destroyed in strict confidence upon completion of recruitment process.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Lina Bouth Administration Manager 010-234-538 / 089 713 535 lina.bouth@expeditors.com LSI Building, #03, 6th Floor, St. 1019 (Phnom Penh-Hanoi), Sangkat Phnom Penh Thmey, Khan Sensok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010-234-538 / 089 713 535

Job Description:
Job Description

Ensure timely and accurate movement of freight and information, while providing exceptional customer service within the Ocean Export Department.

Key Deliverables
Qualifications
• Understand and follow Customer’s Standard Operations Procedures.
• Understand and compliant with Department Standard Processes, KPIs according to OPS & Company’s Policy
• Handle booking and shipping tasks smoothly and timely manner 
• Professional communicate with all external & internal business parties (verbal & written), provide exceptional customer service
• Prepare shipping documents correctly and timely.
• Monitor and update shipment’s status timely.
• Ensure accurate and timely data entry into systems according to OPS & Policy
• Complete 52 training hours per year and other mandatory courses as per required by company’s guideline
• Proactively promote the company’s 10 cultural attributes:  Appearance, Attitude, Confidence, Curiosity, Excellence, Integrity, Pride, Resolute, Sense of Humor, and Visionary.
Job Requirement:
Delivered Skill-Sets and Characteristics
1. Bachelor degree, going to graduate or 6 months to 1 year related experience. 
2. Oral and written proficiency in the English language. 
3. Ability to work productively both individually and in a team environment
4. Sense of urgency for goal achievement
5. Self-motivated with ability to work in a fast-paced and constantly changing environment
6. Strong problem solving, organizational, and interpersonal skills
7. Timeliness and accountability for results

Company Profile:
Established in 2012, Battambang Agro Industry Co., Ltd. (BAI) is the leading cassava starch processing and distribution company in northwest region of Cambodia.  This state-of-art processing facility, produces three different grades of cassava/tapioca native starch with exporting quality, and has an annual current production capacity of 70,000 MT.

BAI’s Vision is to be the leading native tapioca supplier of the world.  Our Mission is to manufacture high quality products, with the aim to help diversify Cambodia’s agricultural sector and striving to make practice that could help the company to achieve its future vision.

With our expansion plan, we are looking for highly motivated, experienced and calibre individual to lead our company to achieve our vision and mission:

Job Description:
1- To do monthly closing of books of accounts.

3- Provide recommendations on financial reports
4- To approve all the general vouchers and ensure that they are correct before being posted into the system.
5- To ensure the correctness of all the reports submitted by cashiers, debtors and stock supervisor.
6- To maintain proper accounts and supporting documents at all times for verification.
7- Handle on Tax declaration
8- To ensure documents are stored in a systematic order in archives.
9- To provide necessary training to staff members Business operation related with Tax
10- To do appraisals of thee staff member
11- To protect the data by making timely back up of the system.
12- Other tasks will assigned by upper level
Job Requirement:

2. Minimum Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting or related field
3. Strong Knowledge in Managing accounting tasks
4. 5-10 years up relevant experiences in Managing accounting, Tax declaration, in factory industry , Audit experience would be a plus
5. Strong knowledge and skill of Cambodia Tax Law with practice
6. High attention to detail and accuracy
7. Good command of English communication for both writing and speaking
8. Good command of Computer skill and Accounting System
9. Good analytical & problem solving skills, attentive to detail
10. Ability to multi-task, work under pressure and meet deadlines required.
11. Be able to travel an stay for work at Battambong from time to time for Based in Phnom Penh

Job Description:
The Procurement Officer will cover Purchasing process
-Responsible to all Purchasing activity within the Company
-Responsible of Purchasing for Bill-Of-Material (BOM) and non-BOM items
-Responsible of Production Material Planning, together with input from Sales and Plant. Directly in-charge of raw material, working capital
-Work with Regional Office with regards to Raw Material Planning in term of supplier allocation, delivery, pricing and quality
-Continue to look for cost reduction opportunity, by not compromising quality and technical specification
-Ensure suppliers quality and delivery timeline meeting company’s expectation and standard
-Ensure the stock of raw materials and spare parts are sufficient for production (store management)
-Ensure all Purchasing activity adhere to Company
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's Degree in Accounting or relevant field.
- 1 year of experience in logistic and Purchase Order.
- Good common in English 
- Able to work independently.
- Computer Literate: Microsoft Office E-mail &Internet.
- Be honest and responsible towards the job.
- Willing to work hard and be flexible on timings.

Job Description:
Duties
- Prepare Leasing Document
- Assist indirectly for factory visit
- Follow up inquiry
- Appoint for negotiation with potential client 
- Ensure that information required are completed for leasing contract 
- Work with Legal team to prepare lease agreement contract after final negotiation 
- Informing Finance Department about expected tenant’s payment transfer; confirming payment clearance of tenants upon handover of properties. 
- Responsible for handover move-in process and move out process of non-renewal and early termination leases.
- Maintaining all lease file systems, both in paper format and electronically that may be easily accessed by the team. 
- Prepare and distribute correspondence such as memos and letters. 
- Monitor weekly for the rental properties 
- Send monthly renewal/non-renewal notices (6 months prior to expiry date) 
- Discuss for advice regarding to new building quotation, and increased rental capped for renewal notice 
- Assist with Utility Bills 
- Forward monthly bills to tenants 
- Communicate with tenant and management team in case of payment delayed
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement
- The Leasing Executive should be well organized, and have a strong ability to pay attention to detail.
- Leasing Executive must be able to communicate with others, identify problems, and resolve potential conflicts.
- Bachelor degree in Finance/Business or Accounting
- Understand and can speak basic Chinese
- Good at communication, interpersonal skill, and be flexible
- Professional attitude and appearance.
- Ability to be resourceful and proactive when issues arise.
- Multitasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.
- Customer service attitude.
- Have good computer skills.

Job Description:
On behalf the Sales Manager, s/he must have roles and responsibilities as the following job description: 

1- Overall Scope of Work
- determine staffing requirements
- train new staff
- supervise direct reporting staff according to overall company policy
- apply strategic planning to determine company, department or unit objectives
set employee goals and objectives
- develop staff to maximize potential
- monitor staff performance including performance reviews
- delegate work duties to staff to attain objectives
- allocate use of available resources
- monitor and assist staff with work progress
- evaluate current business processes and systems
- plan and implement procedures and systems to maximize operating efficiency
- establish and maintain controls
- formulate department/unit policies and practices
- co-ordinate financial and budget activities for maximum operational efficiency
- facilitate the preparation and analysis of reports
- review performance data (financial, sales and activity reports) to monitor and measure productivity, goal progress and activity levels
- responsible for the achievement of department/division/unit productivity and quality goals

2- Main Focus
- Responsible for performing of the sales team to achieve the Quarter target. 
- Set a Sales Target (Monthly, Quarterly) to sales team
- Prepare Daily, weekly and monthly sales report
- High commitments to meet Quarter Sales Targets and objectives of PTC
- Promote the brand awareness to customers
- Perform Market Research and Review Branding Strategy
- Supervise and guide sales representative
- Solve problem and negotiate with Customers
- Work closely with relevant departments and the corporate office throughout the sales process
- Perform ad-hoc duties that may be deemed essential to fulfill the functions of the position
- Studying competitors' products and services.
- Develop the sales strategic plan
- Improve the liaison with new customers and keep the existing customers
- must be able to work independently and efficiently to meet deadlines
- Cooperate with the staffs in all departments
- Other works as assigned by its Director

3- Key Competencies
- judgment
- decision-making
- information management
- resource management
- planning and organizing
- problem analysis and problem solving
- delegating tasks and responsibility
- communication skills
- coaching
- teamwork
- adaptability

4- Professional Skills 
- English Proficiency 
- Management Skill
- Leadership Skill
- IT and Products knowledge with clear specification of the products on hand to sell
- Problems solving Skill
- Monitoring and Evaluation own team
- At least obtain Bachelor Degree or other equivalents.
Job Requirement: - At least 28 years old- At graduate bachelor degree - At least 1 year experience in related - Can speak English or Chinese good (Chinese is preferred)- Can work as team and individual- Able to work with E-mail and Internet- Able to work under pressure** Benefit:- 13thonthly salary- Married Leave- Sick Leave- Funeral Leave- Pregnancy Leave- Healthy Care- Annual Leave - Working time: 8:00 AM ～5:30 PM - Working day: Mon to Sat.- Holiday: Sun / Big National holiday- Salary: Negotiable

PTC Computer Co. Ltd was established in Phnom Penh since 1996. Assist customers to find their requirement with smiling, helpful, respect full and friendly attitude.  3.	After sell Pass to Sales Admin to make S.O and then preparing goods and bring goods to technical team for set up4. Showroom stock count.

Job Description: •	Promote Sathapana Bank’s products and services to clients at the target and remote areas to ensure that both banking services and products are successfully sold to potential clients•	Meet, discuss and assist potential clients in obtaining loan information, loan application and loan disbursement process with other related information which benefit them to ensure the effective customer service and service level agreement•	Discuss and give recommendations to clients on the different types of loans and credit options as well as the terms and conditions of Sathapana Bank’s services and products•	Analyze clients’ assets including financial status, credit and property to assure that the evaluation and determination feasibility of granting loans are effectively executed followed the bank policy and other both internal and external regulatory •	Review and verify loan agreements to ensure that they are well organized, completed and accurate according to the policies and regulatory•	Build a very good relationship and keep in touch with both the existing and the newest potential clients •	Compute, review and update credit and loan files to insure the payment schedule is accurate and effectively executed
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Finance and Banking or other related degrees•	At least 4 years of working experience in loan disbursement with a huge amount of outstanding loan and cooperate loan from financial industries •	Be welcoming, friendly, patient and willing to work at fields •	Good at English and Microsoft Office (Words, Excel, and PowerPoint)
Company Profile: Sathapana Bank is one of the leading commercial banks in Cambodia with total assets of over US$ 1.5 billion as of November 2019 and has become the second largest branch network in the country with 171 branches and 207 ATMs with cash recycling capability We provide full banking services such as loans, deposits, iBanking, Mobile Banking, debit & credit cards, domestic and foreign remittances, Western Union, trade finance, and other services. In Sathapana Bank, we offer wide range of job opportunities to both fresh graduated and experienced talent. Job Description: Ensure the Bank’s policies and procedures are sufficient and in place in compliance with the law and regulations.Identify any inadequacy of policies, procedures, and guidelines within the Bank and recommend for their establishment.Work closely with relevant departments/branches in establishing policies, procedures, or guidelines, for the Bank’s operating environment and assess if additional external expertise is needed.Review and update the policies and procedures that reflects the changing regulatory environment.All updates, revisions and deletions must be recorded and easily accessible.Maintain policies, procedure, guideline requires that policy writers keep accurate files.Collect statistics information of the applicable Banking practices in Cambodia including common practices within the FTB or by various institutions.Convent a meeting from various departments/branch to discuss over found issues or challenges that hinder the establishment of the relevant policies and procedures.Evaluate the outcome whether the policies and procedures improves the operating aspect of the Bank.Ensure that sufficient trainings of policies and procedures are provided to all employee.Make sure employees understand the Bank’s rules and regulations.Prepare quarterly report for Risk Management and Compliance Committee on analyzes of policies, procedure and guideline.Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: Bachelor degree or MBA in Banking & Finance or related fields.At least three year of experience in developing policies and procedures with banking sector or MFIs.Knowledge of Cambodian Labor Law and labor market.Good organizational and time management skills.A strong desire to work in a team and deal with challenges.Good negotiation and internal & external relationship building.Enjoy working with people and be patient, tactful, and approachable.Proficiency in English and computer skills.
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

Job Description:
• Direct and manage delivery of the Bachelor of Science (Research) program
• Liaise with faculties in developing “Core curricula” trans faculty teaching of health sciences
• Liaise with stakeholders to develop and implement the delivery of health sciences for Faculties, Bachelor of Science Program and Foundation Year. To help provide solid science-based programs to promote student success for their further studies. These science units may include: biology, chemistry, biochemistry, laboratory technology, anatomy, physiology
• Work with Research Team and Faculties to develop a research agenda for the Faculty and across the wider university
• Assist faculties with the development of effective Health Sciences programs, courses (including CPD) and initiatives aimed at increasing UP student enrollment and to achieve best practice

** Other responsibilities
•	Work with faculty, students and staff to implement the educational mission of UP
•	Coordinate and participate actively in the editing of content involved in the delivery of instruction
•	Coordinate and participate in the evaluation of student outcomes
•	Evaluate the teaching of health sciences learning and teaching, including informal and formal performance evaluations and improvements related to the curriculum and its delivery
•	Participate with academic staff in the student evaluation of teaching and their health science instruction
•	Work closely with all academic staff in curriculum development, implementation, and assessment with respect to the specific topics in health science as related to health care in general
•	Work closely with all academic staff to optimize the use of technology to support the department's teaching programs
•	Supervise and mentor graduate and professional students and junior staff in health science
•	Develop and provide strategies for developing the Health Science program strategic
•	plan, ensuring that implementation is consistent with overall faculty and UP strategy
•	Develop and oversee a comprehensive system of continuous improvement and Health Sciences programs' compliance with standards 
•	Encourage and promote the highest quality of instruction, including collaboration with faculties and Learning Teaching Department on updated learning and teaching approaches at UP
•	Evaluate Health Sciences programs based upon industry requirements, current market demands, and student outcomes to develop appropriate revisions to existing courses
•	Assist with the preparation and monitoring of budgets for all Health Sciences programs
•	Manage the staffing resource for the Health Science fundamental sciences unit delivery in line with UP’s policies, procedures and best practices, including recruitment, performance management, appraisal and development
•	Provide support and guidance for students in their studies and in conjunction with faculties and departments, undertake any required support of students
•	Provide leadership in recruitment, retention, and development of high-quality faculty
•	Perform other duties and assume additional responsibilities as assigned by the President
Job Requirement:
1.	Experience:
•	At least 3 years administrative and teaching experience managing personnel and programmes within the health industry is required

2.	Education:
•	Masters (PhD preferred) Degree in Health Sciences

3.	Skills/Competencies:
•	Knowledge and Experiences of delivering Health Science courses such as biology, chemistry, biochemistry etc.
•	Excellent communication skills and ability to work as a team
•	Excellent oral and written command of English
•	Excellent oral and written command of Khmer would be highly regarded
•	Knowledge of higher education administration and curriculum development principles/practices
•	Knowledge of accreditation standards and processes

The University welcomes Cambodian and international candidates

job title: Computer Science ‐ Full‐time or Part‐time Lecturer
position: Computer Science ‐ Full‐time or Part‐time Lecturer
Job Description:
** Position Summary:
The University is seeking a Computer Science Full‐time or Part time (50%) Lecturer for the ICT Department. This  role  supports  the  ICT  Department  in  the  design,  development  and  implementation  of  IT  courses following sound pedagogical principles.  
 This role involves: 
•	Support the operation of the ICT Department 
•	Teach a variety of topics in our information technology programs 
•	Conduct academic performance assessments, and development of instructional content for course enhancement 
•	Mentor students on various subjects, including projects 
•	Evaluation and integration of new technologies and effective instructional strategies

** Duties and Responsibilities:  
The overall job description below outlines the main areas of responsibilities of the Employee: 
•	Participate in the strategic workshop about training contents 
•	Create  pedagogic  documents  (syllabus,  lesson  plans,  course material,  assignments…)  for each  course taught, and support other lecturers in doing so according to UP established best practices 
•	Review  of  other  lecturers’  content  (courses,  assignment,  online  learning  content…)  for  software development related courses 
•	Implement the training program 
•	Suggest areas for improvement (curriculum, learning and teaching…) 
•	Develop new courses (including extracurricular courses) 
•	Create or support the creation of tools to optimize pedagogy and learning experience 
•	Being the technological representative and ensuring the smooth running of students' studies 
•	Be the contact on‐site for technical questions 
•	Manage and animate teams of lecturers 
•	Guide and one on one support for students 
•	Provide on‐site courses 
•	Participate and animate meetings for ICT and other departments when required 
•	Animate workshops and work sessions 
•	Assist in the recruitment of lecturers and teaching assistants 
•	Actively  contributing  in  the  program  reports  for  the  ACC,  HED  (Higher  Education  Department)  and internal UP reports 
•	Support on the development of marketing content for the ICT department
Job Requirement:
. Experience: 
•	At least 4 years experience in Software Development 
•	Experience developing and delivering training and effective support materials 
•	Experience in system and networking  

2. Education: 
•	Bachelor’s degree or other relevant degrees 

3. Skills/Competencies: 
•	Linux / Apache  
•	Front end web development: HTML5 / CSS3 / JS / Bootstrap / any JS Framework 
•	Programming: advanced experience in at least one language Laravel, Python, Java, NodeJS, C, C++… 
•	Advanced algorithm concept 
•	Advanced Database concept 
•	Optional: Mobile development (Android, React Native), Artificial Intelligence 
•	MS Office suite 
•	Strong oral and written skills (Khmer and English) 
•	Ability to work independently and as a team  
•	Demonstrated ability to make independent judgment and work under pressure  
•	Strong interpersonal skills  
•	Ability to interact successfully with student body, faculties and administration 

4.	 Personal Quality 
•	Honesty, Integrity, Enthusiasm, Creativity, and passion for education and enabling learning.  
•	Strong sense of initiative, dedication, and responsibility 
•	Good pedagogy, patient and attentive 
•	Organized, rigorous, reliable 
•	Communicant, good editorial

Job Description: I. Position Summary:Provide excellent quality evidence-based, project-based, and student-centered education inaccordance with MOE curriculum requirements to ensure that UP Foundation Year students arewell-prepared with the knowledge base to successfully progress into their chosen Faculty.II. Duties and Responsibilities:The overall job description below outlines the main areas of responsibilities of the Employee:● Responsible for a minimum 21 hours per week of student contact hours with Foundation Year students;● Ensures that the course outline is followed with regard to program and course learning outcomes;● Establishes clear lines of communication with students and other lecturers;● Provides quality teaching within their subject material using a wide variety of teachingmethodologies and technologies to better develop and deliver materials both online and in-person;● Reports any issues with student engagement or course content promptly to course coordinator,Foundation Year program coordinator, or the Director as appropriate;● Promotes a classroom environment of enquiry and resilience, encouraging students to question,dissent, and develop their own ideas with research and critical thinking;● Maintains accurate student records of attendance and scores;● Assists in developing co-curricular activities in the Foundation Year program to enhance quality ofstudent education;● Creates, delivers, and monitors assessments to be an academically rigorous and accuraterepresentation of student learning and ability;● Designs and implements resit examinations and review classes as needed;● Participates in relevant committees within department/faculty;● Completes administrative tasks promptly and accurately during office hours;● Assists in further preparatory courses, professional development, and other additional duties as requested by the course coordinator and Director
Job Requirement: III. Qualifications and Requirements:1. Education:● Two years of teaching experience● Digital education and experience with online learning platforms preferred● Research experience and publication desirable, not required2. Education:● Bachelor’s degree in relevant subject area, or equivalent experience● Subject areas:  - General sciences (Semester 1): biology,     biochemistry, physics, chemistry  - Health sciences (Semester 2): English medical     terminology, anatomy, embryology  - Mathematics: algebra, geometry, pre-calculus,     statistics  - Research methodology3. Skills/Competencies:● Bilingual in Khmer and English● Competent in computer applications, especially Google Workspace● Strong critical thinking and problem solving skills● Strong written and verbal communication skills● Ability to work independently and as part of a team● Time management skills

Job Description:
The Customer Acquisition Executive is responsible for acquiring new customers through outbound call. This position is responsible for reaching out to potential customers delivering a sales presentation with passion, commitment, courtesy and professionalism. Additionally, this position uses unwavering customer service and high ethical selling standards. 

Job Responsibilities: 
● Perform outbound call and use social platform to contact customer (list provided) in order to welcome newly 
registered customer and offer exclusive promotion to the customer." 
● Build positive working relationships with customers for repeat businesses. 
● Provide excellent customer services and ensure customer satisfaction. 
● Work with Marketing Department to plan and execute marketing campaign in order to boost the sale performance 
● Prepare working report and perform analysis to evaluate the effectiveness of acquisition programs. 
● Meeting department monthly sales target
Job Requirement:

job title: Senior Digital Marketing Specialist (Work From Home)
position: Senior Digital Marketing Specialist (Work From Home)
Job Description:
The incumbent is responsible for assisting the Digital Marketing Department or team to provide analysis and reporting on digital projects / campaigns and placements, website traffic, social media impression and others. You should keep an eye on data that shows changing trends in advertising consumption. 
This role requires one who is keep abreast of new social media sites, web technologies and digital marketing trends. If you’re an excellent communicator, capable & passion in digital marketing-related job, we would love to hear from you. 

Key Responsibilities: 
• Communicating and collaborating with internal and external stakeholders to effectively devise, structure and deliver marketing strategies
• Plan, build and propose new acquisition strategies including outreach on social media, 3rd party sites, and influencers to achieve marketing targets and to increase the sign-up traffic and acquisition. 
• To plan and monitor campaigns and promo analytics, and spending against the budget allocated and to prepare reports on a timely manner on the campaigns’ performance.
• Analyse conversion funnel and report audience information and demographics, as well as the success of the social media projects for marketing leads and conversion rate. 
• Oversee management of marketing/media agencies for social media and 3rd party sites to ensure performances are aligned to marketing objectives and roadmap.
• Conduct market research, analysing and identifying the latest trends/technologies and competitor analysis to stay abreast of the industry trends including competitor analysis to provide suggestions for improvements.
Job Requirement: • Candidate must possess at least Diploma / Graduate Diploma / Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Mass Communication or Advertising / Media or any equivalent. • Prefer 2-3 years of working experiences in strategizing and optimizing paid media strategies on various channels including Facebook / Instragram, Adwords, Youtube and other third-party ad platforms. • Required language(s): English & Khemer. Good command in spoken and written in English, Mandarin will be an added advantage. • Proficient in Microsoft Excel. • Well-versed in Facebook’s algorithm and strong familiarity with multiple social media platforms to enhance brand awareness, impressions and has proven track record in managing and optimizing paid media campaigns. • Tech savvy and has good knowledge of online marketing tools. • Experience in marketing agency, e-commerce, affiliate marketing or drop shipping business will be an added advantage. • Working hour - 5 days per week, 9am to 6pm (GMT+7) • Ability to work under pressure, independent • Problem-solving aptitude• Excellent interpersonal & communication abilities. ** Benefits: • Twenty-five (25) days Annual Leave in a year.• After probation increment based on performance.• Bonus payout quarterly based on performance.• Annual festival celebrations and gifts.• Medical coverage.• Gym membership coverage.• Friendly working environment.** Contact Information:Ms. You Sreypouv +85587438181you.sreypouv@blacksire.comAddress: Victory Paradise Resort Victory Hill, Sangkat 3, Sihanoukville 18000, Cambodia
Contact Info: Contact Information You Sreypouv  85587438181 you.sreypouv@blacksire.com Victory Paradise Resort Victory Hill , Sangkat 3, Sihanoukville 18000, Cambodia 85587438181

Job Description: •	Perform all necessary repairs, ensuring safety and condition of the hotel are excellent.•	Repair electric, plumbing, painting installations of all buildings, rooms and equipment.•	Ensure high quality of finishing for every maintain job.•	Make sure the security of the team, guests and the building is ensured at all times.•	Respond to emergency maintenance requests immediately.•	Keep maintenance stock area clean, neat and tidy.•	Communicate to front desk any occurrences involving customers’ request or complaints.•	Be responsible for any works done and write down in daily report.•	Ensure the all-documented procedures set are implemented and maintained at all times.•	Monitor the condition electrical wiring in premises.•	Modify any machineries or equipment if the actual parts is not source able.•	stop machine if detected any faults.•	request for replacement of spare parts.•	Perform other related duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: •	High school diploma or lower degree accepted.•	Experience 2 years in Maintenance.•	High responsible. •	Be Patient, Honest and flexible.•	Willing to learn new things and over time.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:
Accounts Administrator responsibilities mainly include reviewing and reconciling accounts, processing payments to external partners and staffs, and maintaining updated records of invoices and receipts.
1. [AR] Prepare, issue, and store VAT invoices (Excel) & Non-VAT invoices (ZOHO) and collect payment from customers
2. [Accounting] Update and maintain Cashflow report on a daily basis
3. [Accounting] Update and maintain Daily Capital Report on a daily basis
4. [Accounting] Cooperate with outsourced tax agency for monthly tax declare
5. [Accounting] In charge of Banking – Deposit, Withdraw, TT, Cheque, etc.
6. [Admin] Calculate payroll by checking attendance, leave, food allowance and OT – store documents in order and organize folders*
7. [AP] Manage obligations to suppliers, customers and third-party vendors by issuing payments (cheque, cash, etc.) to suppliers by cooperating with Purchasing – e.g., LG Thailand, Oeung Keang, NEST, PP Advance, etc.
8. [AR] Report on the status of accounts payable and receivable by running AR reports in Zoho and follow up payment progress on a weekly basis.
9. [Admin] Perform any miscellaneous tasks requested by top management for office work e.g., customer care, communication with locals, translation, document work, etc.

Job Description: Engineering design and drafting support is needed for projects related to improving utility and communication companies’ engineering and construction operations. Projects can include utility pole attachment projects and programs, distribution engineering design projects, distribution system improvement projects, and long-term infrastructure improvement programs. The work relates directly to improving network reliability of electric distribution systems and expanding high speed fiber networks.Responsibilities:• Apply client standards and other applicable guidelines to complete engineering designs (utility pole replacements, communication space rearrangements, joint-use design) for possible joint-use or make-ready construction• Ability to analyze field collected data (including imagery) and accurately update applicable software packages for successful design implementation• Knowledge of GIS software and ability to input engineering and design data accurately and completely into GIS software• Ability to create distribution circuit maps within GIS and other software packages• Communicate with co-workers, to agree on the best solution for engineering design• Accountable for work assigned and responsible for completing work on project schedule and within project budget while regularly communicating status with management team
Job Requirement: Minimum Requirements:• Must be an organized person who can keep data organized from start to finish on a project• Ability to prioritize work on multiple projects and effectively communicate project statuses• Computer proficiency including general Microsoft Office products, design, and business enterprise software• Effective written and oral communication at all levels within an organizational structure• Reasoning skills and ability to solve practical problems• Ability to work from home and an office setting, as required• Fluency in Khmer and English ability at a professional levelPreferred Qualifications:• Degree in engineering, engineering technology or related technical discipline with up to five years of experience in technical design, drafting, or utility experience• Ability to read and understand engineering drawings/schematics• Working knowledge of electrical distribution assets and/or communication equipment construction• Experience with construction modeling software, AutoCAD is beneficial• Familiar with design and checking practices for engineering drawings and deliverables

Job Description:
− Manage the collateral and other security documents after loan disbursement. 
− Focus on leading the establishing policy, procedure, manual and templates for Credit  Operation Center and Branches for implementing smooth process. 
− Able to identify the suitable professional technical work and solution regarding  hypothecation, blocking, filling, and insurance work cope to cover the Bank risk. 
− Support the requirements for internal control, internal audit, external audit, or management  regarding the Bank loan files, and security documents regarding the Credit Operation  Center Manual.
− Overall manage Asset Management Team perform daily duties in ensuring of proper  security documents and collaterals are safeguarding in accordance with the Credit  Operation Manual. 
− Manual: Collaborate with current business needs, cross departments and risk management  in order to draft the procedure guide lines and discussion for submitting for approval. 
− Ensure team perform effectively and efficiently. Make sure of the abnormal long pending work is under track for completion. 
− Checking work status and ensure loan files are on track to deliver to assigned location 
− Checking work status and ensure envelops are on track to be sealed and deliver to vault. 
− Ensure team is followed the manual guideline of security document management 
− Make sure of register format/templates are delivered and coach to team and branch team  for smooth implementation. 
− Approve for HQ’s collateral or security document In/Out requests
− Verify and approve monthly insurance calculation. 
− Verify and approve monthly insurance estimation for account team 
− Verify monthly internal control work requirement and submit on time 
− Verify and approve monthly blocking fund balance 
− Make sure of conducting physical collateral envelop count according to the guideline  manual. 
− Conduct branch monitoring and oversight the credit management process, ensuring that  the quality of the Bank’s standard work on part of asset management according to the 
guideline manual. 
− Check and approve legal document for CET Team 
− Approved Checklist and loan drawdown. 
− Assist Deputy General Manager/Chief Finance Officer in managing COC in order to operate  smoothly. 
− Other task assigned by Deputy General Manager/Chief Finance Officer.
Job Requirement:
− Master/Bachelor degree of Financial and Banking or related field. 
− Prefer minimum 3 years of banking experience in credit admin operation. 
− At least 2 years experiences in supervisor level. 
− Ability to complete tasks accurately and in a timely manner with attention and to detail. 
− Proactive, positive attitude, customer oriented, self-motivated and good team work. 
− Good command of English.

- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ។
- បទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងចាប់ពី 10ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅក្នុងផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងគណនេយ្យ។
- ភាសាអង់គ្លេស & ជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រ។(Word & Excel)
- ចេះគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលា & មានភាពជាអ្នកដឹកនាំខ្ពស់។
- អាទិភាពសំរាប់អ្នកអាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាកូរ៉េបាន។
- ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម ស្មោះត្រង់ & ឈ្លាសវៃ។

- At least get bachelor in accounting.
- More than 10 year Experience at least​ in account manager.
- High English & Computer skill (Word & Excel).
- Good time management & leadership.
- Able to use Korean is more prefer.
- Hard working, honesty, and flexible

* អត្ថប្រយោជន៍:
•​​ ប្រាក់បន្ថែម៖ ៣ដង/១​ឆ្នាំ ,ចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ និងភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ Bonuses 3 times per year (khmer new year & Pchum Ben

Annual Leave, Sick Leave, Maturity Leave, Special Leave

•​​ ផ្តល់អាហារពេលព្រឹក និងថ្ងៃត្រង់ Lunch Allowance & Breakfast

AIA Cambodia is part of the AIA Group, which is currently the largest independent publicly listed pan-Asian life insurance group and the largest life insurance company in the world by market capitalisation. With our various campaigns and programs so far, we have positively impacted the lives of many thousands more. 

The scale and reach of our business provide a springboard for you to build the right skills and to grow professionally and personally. Join our bold team of young, passionate and talented individuals who thrive to invent positive impacts that uphold our brand promise – help Cambodians live healthier, longer and better lives.

Duties and responsibilities 
•Monitor instructional and managerial processes to ensure that program activities are related to program outcomes and use findings to take corrective actions.
•Regularly consult the campus-level committee about planning, operation, supervision, and evaluation of campus education program. Include students and community representatives when appropriate.
•Provide instructional resources and materials to support teaching staff in accomplishing instructional goals.
•Provide for two-way communication with superintendent, staff, students, parents, and community.
•Communicate and promote expectations for high-level performance to staff and students. Recognize excellence and achievement.
•Ensure the effective and quick resolution of conflicts.
•Build common vision for school improvement with staff. Direct planning activities and put programs in place with staff to ensure attainment of school’s mission.
•Identify, analyze, and apply research findings (e.g., effective school correlates) to promote school improvement. 
•Develop and set annual campus performance objectives for each of the Academic Excellence Indicators using the campus planning process and site-based decision making committee.
•Develop, maintain, and use information systems and records necessary to show campus progress on performance objectives addressing each Academic Excellence Indicator.
•Other relevant tasks are assigned by VP&COO and VP&CFO

company_name: Zhong Ying International School (中英国际学校）
Job Description:
-	Maintain and develop an Academic Quality Framework which includes policies, processes and procedures.
-	Maintain and develop an appropriate assessment framework, which ensures the production of high-quality assessment instruments, which are appropriately marked and lead to fair and consistent awards.
-	Oversee the recruitment and management of external academic consultants who develop, maintain and approve syllabuses and assessments and moderate the marking of assessments. 
-	Propose and manage the Academic Directorate budget ensuring that all essential activities are supported and that services are cost effective.
-	Develop and maintain a suite of academic products that are competitive in the market to ensure appropriate outcomes for students, including appropriate use of digital tools for both delivery and support.
-	Responsibility and accountability for setting and advancing the academic strategy of the Department in line with the other department strategic plans and direction.
-	Create a dynamic and forward-looking research environment for both staff and students
-	Ensure that staff performance is managed appropriately and in a way that is consistent with the expectations of the School, and that fair workload allocation processes are in place.
-	Ensure all staff have access to the necessary support to enable them to contribute fully and develop their skills and experience.
-	Engender a culture of excellence, co-operation and respect both within and beyond the department.
-	Make effective use of all staffing resources and seek opportunities for collaboration and joint working with others beyond the department and beyond the academic members.
-	Ensure a safe and healthy environment for both staff and students, and full compliance with health and safety requirements.
-	Ensure all activities are carried out to the highest possible standards and put in place the necessary evaluation and monitoring procedures to ensure both compliance and improvement: such procedures will include teaching, research and management of all resources.
-	Comply with auditing, quality assurance and risk management procedures both internal and external.
Job Requirement:
-	Have a very strong academic record and standing 
-	Normally be at professorial level - although skills and aptitude will be more important 
-	Have a very good understanding of the academic disciplines within the department
-	Ability to engage constructively with people 
-	Excellent communication skills 
-	Very good ambassadorial and diplomatic skill 
-	Ability to manage a number of competing demands 
-	Excellent delegation skills 
-	Be flexible and adapt to changing circumstances 
-	Be able to develop their skills and seek advice from a variety of sources 
-	be willing and able to exercise judgement and take risks

Job Description:
* Responsibilities 工作範圍：

To manage her quality team to ensure garment made are conforming to brand requirements and be on time for audit and shipment.
管理她的质量团队，以确保制成的服装符合品牌要求，并按时进行审查和出货。

* Job Duties工作職責：
- To implement I Apparel Total Quality Management (TQM) in factory
在工厂实施I Apparel全面质量管理（TQM）
-  To put in place a quality training program with calendar to train and certify quality staff and production team before they take up the assigned job.
制定带有日程的质量培训计划，以在质量和生产团队接受分配的工作之前对其进行 培训和认证。
-  To manage, set goals and responsibilities (TQM) for his Quality Department to ensure right quality work is performed every time and achieving ZERO defect of
AQL 1.0. (Factory Quality Performance Appx 4.0.24) and shipped in full order quantity and on time.
管理，设置品管部门的目标和职责（TQM – Total Quality Management），以确 保每次执行正确的品管工作并实现AQL 1.0的零缺陷。 （工厂质量表现 Appx 4.0.24），并准时按订单数量足额出货。
-  To work toward Self-Quality empowerment from our Buyers and work with buyer quality management team to appointed 3rd party to train I Apparel factory QA team on buyer standards and requirements.
努力从我们的客户那获得自我质量授权，并与客户 质量管理团队合作任命第三方 来对I Apparel工厂质量检查团队进行有关客户标准和要求的培训。
- To work closely with Buyer QA by:
通过以下方式与客户质量检查人员紧密合作：
- Understanding their Quality Standard and disseminate the Standard requirements to his Team
了解他们的质量标准并向自己的团队宣传标准要求
- When handling of Quality issues, to take account of the Quality issues positively, analyze and work immediately with Factory Manager and the Buyer QA for solutions so as to take immediate actions to rectify the issues.
处理质量问题时，要积极考虑质量问题，分析并与厂长和客户质量检查人员一 起合作以寻求解决方案，以便立即采取措施纠正问题。
- To attend Pre-production Meeting,
参加产前会议
-  To set buyer quality standards and call-out product critical operations and work with production team to agree to and put in place mistake proofing processes to produce quality garment that meet buyer standards and requirements or above.
制定客户质量标准和call-out产品关键工序，并与生产团队合作，同意并实施 防错流程，以生产符合客户标准要求或更高要求的优质服装。
-  To ensure order controller write all the agreed processes in Apparel Ezi - PP Meeting call-out.
为确保订单管理员在“Apparel Ezi PP会议”call-out中写出所有商定的流程 。
- After pre-production meeting to brief his team on product critical operations and the agreed mistake proofing processes. This is to ensure quality team is basing on the same decide standard to assure the product quality.
在产前会议之后，向其团队介绍产品关键工序和商定的防错流程。这是为了确保品管团队基于相同的决策标准来确保产品质量。
-  To manage pre-production quality team to
管理产前质量团队去
- Ensure pre-production team follow “the agreed” processes.
确保预产前团队遵循“商定”的流程。
-  Verify fabric received are tested and check for quality correctness before getting approval from Order Controller / Factory Manager for use in production
在获得订单管理员/厂长批准用于生产之前，请验证接收到的布料是否经过测试 并检查质量是否正确。
-  Verify sewing trims received are tested and check for quality correctness before getting approval from Order Controller / Factory Manager for use in production
在获得订单管理员/厂长批准用于生产之前，请验证收到的车缝辅料是否经过测 试并检查质量是否正确。
-  Ensure only perfect cut-piece are transfers to sewing production.
确保仅将完美的裁片传递到车缝生产中。
Ensure embellishment garment received, check and audit for quantity and
quality correctness before transfer to supermarket store for keeping.
在转移到超市仓库进行保存之前，请确保已收到印绣花片，对数量和质量的正
确性进行检查和审核
 To attend weekly Factory shipment & KPI (Key Performance Indicator) meeting
参加每周工厂装运和KPI（关键绩效指标）会议
 To discuss quality issues and work out a solution with factory management
team to ship the order in full quantity and on time delivery.

讨论质量问题，并与工厂管理团队一起制定解决方案，以全量按时交付订单。
 To present Weekly Factory Quality Performance Report (Appendix F5.1.09)
to factory management to make decision to enforce continuous improvement
to upgrade factory quality standard.
向工厂管理层提交《工厂质量每周绩效报告》（附录F5.1.09），以决定实施持
续改进以提高工厂质量标准。
 After Factory shipment & KPI meeting, update her quality on decision made to
resolve the quality and quantity issues and shipment information.
在工厂发货和KPI会议之后，更新其对于解决质量和数量问题以及货运信息所作
出的品质决策。
 To manage Sewing & Finishing Quality team to
管理车缝和后整品管团队去
 Verify packaging materials received are tested and check for quality
correctness before getting approval from Order Controller / Factory Manager
for use in production
在获得订单管理员/厂长批准用于生产中之前，验证收到的包装材料是否经过测
试并检查质量是否正确。

- Ensure embellishment and laundry garment received, check and audit for quantity and quality correctness before transfer to finishing quality team.
确保收到印绣花和洗水成衣，并确保在移交到后整品管团队之前，检查和审核 数量和质量的正确性。
- Ensure Sewing production team follow “the agreed” processes and only good garment are transferred to finishing quality team.
确保车缝生产团队遵循“约定的”流程，并且仅将优质服装移交给后整品管团
队。
- Ensure End Line &Finishing quality team follow “the agreed” processes.
确保线尾和后整品管团队遵循“商定”的流程。
 Ensure Inline Quality Inspector (QI) work with production and engineering team to follow the agreed mistake proofing process to set up the line to produce TOP samples and bulk production.
确保线内巡查员（QI）与生产和工程团队合作，按照商定的防错流程建立TOP样 品和大货生产的生产线。
-  Ensure end line checkers follow the correct checking method to spot defective garment and remove them for immediate repair by the line supervisor. Line checker to record the total, good and defective garment quantity. Only good quality garment are consider as output.
确保线尾检查员遵循正确的检查方法，去发现有缺陷的衣服并立即移走，以便由生产线主管立即返修。线尾检查员记录成衣的总数，良品和不良品的数量。仅将优质的成衣当做产出。
- Ensure Finishing quality team
确保后整品管团队
- Suck clean of thread ends and dust inside out.
在衣服反面吸干净线尾和灰尘。
- Measurement check, Light press to spec
测量尺寸，轻烫至尺寸要求。
-  Check size and put in tags
检查尺寸并打挂卡。
-  Check labels, tags for size correctness
检查商标，挂卡尺寸的正确性。
-  Fold to require size
折叠至所需尺寸。
- Check label size put stickers and polybag.
检查标签尺寸，贴上贴纸和装塑料袋。
-  Check label, sticker, polybag size for correctness and assort put through needle detector
检查商标，贴纸，胶带尺寸是否正确，然后分类放到验针机检查。
-  Check packaging materials for correctness, scan pack into carton.
检查并确保材料的正确性，扫描装箱。
- To ensure factory defect management are in place to prevent defective garments from being shipped.
确保有工厂缺陷管理，以防止有缺陷的服装被出货。
- To manage Product Safety Officer by training him to use Product Safety Compliance Checklist (F5.1.12) to ensure all product safety processes and checks are in place and uncompromised.
通过培训产品安全理员使用产品安全合规性检查表（F5.1.12），以确保所有产品 安全过程和检查均到位且不打折，从而对产品安全员进行管理。
- To encourage management audit from Top management and Factory executive level to assess the results of I Apparel Total Quality Management (TQM) in the factory.
鼓励高层管理人员和工厂执行主任人员进行管理审查，以评估工厂I Apparel全面 质量管理（TQM）的结果。
-  To solve quality issues immediately, should be either "yes (White) or no (Black) and no such thing as grey area. Put in place a temporary or permanent corrective
and preventive action plan with production team, to stop the errors from repeating. Write action plan in Apparel-QMS. Quality issues are classified under the 3 mains root cause.
要立即解决质量问题，应为“是（白色）或否（黑色），并且没有灰色区域”。与 生产团队一起制定临时或永久的纠正和预防措施计划，以防止重复出现错误。在
Apparel-QMS中制定行动计划。质量问题分类到三个主要原因下。
- To ensure the below report are pass to quality clerk to comply into management report.
确保将以下报告传递给品管文员，以使其进入管理报告。
- Final Audit Report (Appendix 4.0.1)
最终审核报告（附录4.0.1）
- Measurement Finding Report (Appendix 4.0.2)
量尺结果报告（附录4.0.2）
- Fabric & Cutting Audit Report (Appendix 4.0.3)
面料和裁剪审核报告（附录4.0.3）
- Order Audit Report (Appendix 4.0.5)
订单审核报告（附录4.0.5）
- Preliminary/Management Audit Report (Appendix 4.0.6)
初步/管理审核报告（附录4.0.6）
- Carton Audit Report (Appendix 4.0.7)
纸箱审核报告（附录4.0.7）
- To guide Quality clerk to comply the below quality reports
指导品管文员照做以下质量报告
- Factory Quality Performance Report (Appendix F5.1.09)
工厂质量绩效报告（附录F5.1.09）
- Supplier Performance Report (Appendix F5.1.23)
供应商绩效报告（附录F5.1.23）
- To present Factory Quality Performance Report (Appendix F5.1.09) and Supplier Performance Report (Appx. F5.1.23) to Factory & Top management. This information allows the factory management to make continuous product quality
improvement decisions based on 3 mains root cause.
向工厂和最高管理层提交《工厂质量绩效报告》（附录F5.1.09）和《供应商绩效 报告》（附录F5.1.23）。该信息使工厂管理层可以基于3个主因来做出持续的产品 质量改进决策。
- Human Factor: To monitor Pre production & Production Supervisor, Leader and workers' work quality level, recommend to Factory Manager to take
appropriate action to train and upgrade our work force or replace them with trained & qualified worker.
人为因素：要监控产前和生产主管，组长和工人的工作质量水平，建议厂长采 取适当的措施来培训和升级我们的劳动力，或者由经过培训的合格工人代替。
- Material: To monitor our material suppliers and internal supply department& product quality level, provide the results for the management to take appropriate action to upgrade our suppliers or replace them with better quality suppliers.
物料：为了监控我们的物料供应商和内部供应部门的产品质量水平，向管理层提供结果，以采取适当的措施来升级我们的供应商或将其替换为质量更好的供 应商。
-  Machinery: To monitor machinery defect's root cause, provide results for the management to take appropriate action to upgrade or replace those machineries and look into the effectiveness of "TPM" implementation by the
engineering team.
机械：要监控机械缺陷的根本原因，向管理层提供结果，以采取适当的措施来 升级或更换那些机械，并由工程团队调查实施“ TPM”的有效性。
-  To follow Company Rules & regulations.
ត្រូវគោរព និងប្រតិបត្តិតាមវិធាន និងបទបញ្ជារបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
要遵守公司各项规章制度
- Other job assigned by the management.
ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតត្រូវបានកំណត់ដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
服从管理安排的其他工作

* Management or Supervisory Duties:
管理或监督职责：
- Daily Operations: To ensure the daily functioning of a department or section or team.
日常运营：确保部门、区域或团队的日常运作。
- Administration: To complete basic administrative work (manage appraisal, confirmation, promotion, discipline, leave, attendance, absentee) and correspond
among department or section or team.
行政管理：完成基本的行政管理工作（管理评估，确认，晋升，纪律，请假，出勤，缺勤），并在部门，区域或团队之间沟通。
-  Evaluation: To encourage satisfactory work, regularly evaluate data and employee performance. Reward and promote good performers, and coach and motivate poor performers. Track and report scorecard results to senior management.
评估：为了鼓励令人满意的工作表现，定期评估数据和员工绩效。奖励和提升表现 出色的员工，并指导和激励表现不佳的员工。追踪计分卡的进度与结果并将其报告 给高级管理层。
-  Enforcing Policy: Ensure adherence to legal and company policies and procedures, offering wisdom when appropriate and discipline when necessary. Enforce company policy to cultivate an environment that makes
employees hold one another accountable for their actions. 
执行政策：确保遵守法律和公司的政策和程序，在适当时运用智慧，在必要时做出 惩戒。执行公司政策，以营造使员工对自己的行为负责的环境。
-  Staffing: To interview, identify, hire, and train new employees. To coach and further develop existing employees.
人员配备：面试，鉴定，雇用和培训新员工。指导和进一步培育现有的员工。
- Leadership: To provide the employees and their resources with enough guidance, direction, leadership and supportnecessary to ensure that they are
able to accomplish their goals. To develop team members through positive and constructive feedback and coaching. 
领导：为员工及其资源提供足够的辅导，指导，领导和支持，以确保他们能够实现 目标。通过积极和建设性的反馈和指导来培养团队成员。
 Set Goals: To possess the ability to set goals for performance and deadlines in ways that comply with company’s plans and vision and communicate them to
subordinates.
设定目标：能够以符合公司计划和愿景的方式设定绩效目标和截止日期，并将其传 达给下属。
- Delegation: To possess the ability to delegate a section / team workload effectively and monitor its progress towards completion while not delegating the
ultimate responsibility for this work. To possess the ability to identify the strengths and weaknesses of each staff member and give them work that they can complete effectively while also challenging them to achieve more.
委派：具有有效委派团队工作量并监视其完成进度的能力，而不会委派这项工作的 最终责任。拥有识别每个员工优势和劣势的能力，并为他们提供可以有效完成的工 作，同时也挑战他们取得更大的成就。
-  Communication: To be able to effectively communicate with both staff and superiors as well as convey the necessary information to the various stakeholders concerned.
沟通：能够与员工和上级进行有效沟通，并将必要的信息传达给相关的各个利益相 关者。
- Collaboration: To serve as a role model for working together. Encourage and support cross-functional efforts and model collaborative behaviors to set as positive example for team members.
协作：通过鼓励和支持跨职能的工作并为协作行为提供榜样，成为团队成员的榜样 。
- Monitoring: To monitor the department or section or team to ensure that the plan to achieve the goals set is being carried out in such a way that its accomplishment is assured while initiating action to strengthen results
监控：监督部门、区域或团队，以确保正在执行实现目标的计划正在用可以确保其 完成的方式开展，同时采取行动以加强结果。
- Motivate: To motivate staff and create an environment where employees can thrive and succeed. Create an open, positive and innovative work culture.
激励：激励员工并创造一个使员工得以蓬勃发展和成功的环境。建立开放，积极和 创新的工作文化。
- Coaching: To coach and train staff of new policies, workflows, technologies or systems to help them perform their positions more efficiently. 
指导：对员工进行新政策，工作流程，技术或系统的指导和培训，以帮助他们更有 效地履行其职责。
- Organizing: To organize workflow and ensuring that employees understand their duties or delegated tasks
组织：组织工作流程并确保员工理解其职责或委派的任务
- Support: To provide support in problem resolution and decision-making
支持：为解决问题和做决策提供支持。
- Succession Planning: To carry out succession planning which helps to prepare for smooth staff transitions in the event of deployment and staffing changes within the organization. 
继任计划：执行继任计划，当在组织内部署和人员变动时，这有助于为平稳的员工 过渡提前做准备。
- Mentorship: To ensure that staff members are assigned mentors and given mentoring guidance to ensure staff members’ professional development to
improve the professional knowledge, competence, skillset and effectiveness of the individual staff and the department, section or team.
导师制：为员工分配导师并提供指导，以确保员工的专业发展，提高每个员工、部 门、区域和团队的专业知识、能力、技能和效率。
- 7S Work Place: To implement 7S work place and maintain a safe, secure, and legal work environment.
7S工作场所：实施7S工作场所，并维护安全，可靠且合法的工作环境。
- Financial: To monitoring and control assets, expenses and budgets.
财务：监控和控制资产，支出和预算。
- Handling Pressure: The business world is often competitive and challenging, so an effective manager or supervisor should possess the ability to withstand the pressure and thrive in a high stakes environment.
处理压力：商业世界通常是竞争激烈且充满挑战的，因此有力的经理或主管应具备 承受压力并在高风险环境中蓬勃发展的能力。
-  Adaptation: The business sector is constantly changing, and managers or supervisors should possess the ability to adapt to alternative technologies,
management structures, and forms of communication.
适应：业务部门在不断变化，经理或主管应具有适应替代技术、管理结构和沟通形 式的能力。
- Initiative: To be pro-active and take the initiative to take action when necessary and not wait for their superiors to give instructions.
主动性：要积极主动，并在必要时主动采取行动，而不要等上级指示。
Job Requirement:
- University Degree major in Business Administration, Marketing/Finance or other related disciplines or Diploma or courses in Fashion or Apparel related field.
工商管理，市場營銷/金融或其他相關學科的大學學位，或時裝或服裝相關領域的 文憑或課程
-  Passionate in the apparel industry and with at least 20 years working experience in garment production manufacturing.
對服裝行業充滿熱情，並且在服裝生產製造方面具有至少20年的工作經驗
- A strong communicator with excellent spoken and written English, Chinese (Mandarin) is advantage
具有良好的溝通能力，並且具有良好的英語和普通話口語和書面表達能力將優先考 慮
- Proficiency in computer, Microsoft Word/ Excel, ERP and other office applications.
精通計算機，Microsoft Word / Excel，ERP和其他辦公應用程序
- Strong management, planning & organization skills, able to multi-task in fast paced environment and work under tight deadlines
強大的管理，計劃和組織能力，能夠在快速的環境中執行多項任務，並在緊迫的期 限內完成工作
- Strong business sense, negotiation, persuasive skill, capable to deal with overseas buyers / factories independently;
較強的業務意識，談判能力，說服力，能夠獨立與海外買家/工廠打交道
- Highly motivated, self-initiated, customer-oriented, willing to achieve objectives with clear vision.
上進心強，主動進取，以客戶為中心，願意以清晰的願景實現目標
- Presentable, responsible, result-oriented and a good team player and interpersonal skills.
善于表达，負責任，注重結果，良好的團隊合作精神和人際交往能力
- Have a strong sense of urgency, immediately report with options and resolution.
有強烈的緊迫感，即时提供選項和解決方案
-  To be stationed in Cambodia Headquarters
將駐紮在柬埔寨總部
 Business travelling is required
需要商務出差
Company Profile: Since 2015, IApparel International Group has been living for its purpose to initiate the peaceful coexistence of fashion and sustainability. As a reliable manufacturing partner of world-famous apparel brands, we use available modern technologies to apply ESG standards in every work we do, from start to finish. Our creations celebrate our love for our planet, the well-being of the people making them, and ultimately the joy and safety of individuals wearing them, no matter their age.

Job Description:
- Responsible for all finishing activities such as blockwork & plastering, screeding work, waterproofing work, ceiling, painting, tiling, marble works, PU flooring and landscaping.
- Carry out the specified inspection/test in accordance with relevant inspection/test plans, including the works of the subcontractors.
- Overall, supervision, and coordination of General Person/Engineer areas of responsibilities and the allocation of work areas.
- Follow-up to ensure execution of work is carried out in accordance with approved method statements.
- Follow-up with General Person/Engineer efficient usage of materials to minimize wastage, and supervise materials storage area.
- Coordinates and monitors with contractors for their daily construction activities and their obligations and liaison with subcontractors.
- Coordinate and preparing weekly and daily target schedules for all types of activities.
- To check the quality of all the materials received on-site and prepare quality reports, defects, if any.
- Review requirements of the specification and relevant standards and ensure understanding and compliance of work done with the specified requirements of the specification and drawings.
Job Requirement:
- Minimum 03 years of experience in building construction or a related area.
- Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering or a related field.
- Knowledge of finishing engineer (Building) of the construction site.
- AutoCAD, Ms office, project management, and software design are preferred.
- Good communication skills both written and verbal) in Khmer and English.
- Good leadership & problem-solving skills.

Job Description:
* Responsibilities工作範圍: 
 សិក្សាលើថវិកាប្រចាំឆ្នាំរបស់រោងចក្រនិងគ្រប់គ្រងថ្លៃដើមរោងចក្រឱ្យបានទាបបំផុត។
• To work on factory yearly budget and manage factory cost to the lowest.
制定工廠年度預算並將工廠成本降至最低
គ្រប់គ្រងផ្នែកផលិតកម្ម  អនុវត្តន៏ផែនការរយ:ពេលខ្លី/រយ:ពេលវែង នឹងត្រូវប្រាកដ្ឋថា តំណើរការរោងចក្រគឺនៅនឹងកន្លែង
